channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Fire at Turkish ski resort kills least 10 people, injures dozens more
item.description: Witnesses say guests at a ski resort hotel in Turkey tried to escape a fire that killed at least 10 people with ropes and sheets hung from windows.

item.title: Trump inauguration live updates: First pardoned Jan. 6 rioters released in D.C.
item.description: Two Pennsylvania brothers arrested for their role in the riots were released in Washington, D.C. on Monday night.

item.title: Journalist shot dead, prosecutor's office bombed in Peru
item.description: Gaston Medina previously told the Committee to Protect Journalists he received death threats related to his reporting.

item.title: Fire chief shot and killed after stopping to help driver who hit deer with their car
item.description: A fire chief in Alabama has been shot and killed after he stopped to help a driver who had hit a deer with their vehicle, police said.

item.title: 43 states under cold weather alerts, blizzard warning in parts of Texas
item.description: A storm is bringing the first-ever blizzard warning issued for Beaumont, Texas, and Lake Charles and Lafayette, Louisiana.

item.title: Beneath a veneer of calm, Trump’s inauguration holds warning signs for US democracy
Ryan Corbett's family say he's been freed in U.S.-Taliban prisoner swap
item.description: Afghanistan's Taliban government announced the release of 2 Americans in a prisoner exchange. Ryan Corbett's family says he's one of them.

item.title: Trump wants to pull the US out of the World Health Organization again. Here’s what may happen next
Six egg brands recalled over salmonella contamination
Thailand's visa waiver for Chinese tourists under fire after string of crimes
Bollywood actor Saif Ali Khan home from hospital days after knife attack by intruder
Trump admin to acknowledge only a person’s gender assigned at birth, officials say
item.description: President Donald Trump is set to issue a slew of executives actions on his first day in office Monday that would affect transgender Americans.

item.title: Border Patrol agent shot dead on Vermont highway, near Canadian border
item.description: A U.S. Border Patrol agent was fatally shot on a highway in northern Vermont south of the Canadian border, authorities said.

item.title: LIVE: ABC News Live
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events

item.title: Trump grants sweeping pardon of Jan. 6 defendants, including rioters who violently attacked police
item.description: President Donald Trump has pardoned, commuted the prison sentences or vowed to dismiss the cases of all of the 1,500-plus people charged with crimes i...

item.title: At least 10 dead, 32 injured in a hotel fire at a ski resort in northwestern Turkey
Trump announces purge of over 1,000 Biden appointees
Inauguration Day in America | CBS News Special Report
item.description: CBS News brings you top moments and takeaways from President Trump's inauguration and looks ahead to his second term in office in this special report.
